body:
With school starting (or almost starting):

What are you guys looking forward to?
What do you guys hate most about school? 
What are your favorite or least favorite subjects?

title: School pros or cons

replies.body:
What are you guys looking forward to? 
Looking forward to seeing my friends again, and finally getting into a productive mindset (summer made me lazy, lol.)
What do you guys hate most about school?  
Homework.
What are your favorite or least favorite subjects?
I'm fine with everything, nothing is really bad or amazing.

replies.body:
What are you guys looking forward to? 
Being with friends again.
What do you guys hate most about school?  
Probably getting up early so I can get to school late on the the bus, and then getting home around 5
What are your favorite or least favorite subjects?
I like english and Social studies, Don't like math and science.

Bit of Storm wisdom here.  I know what I have to say doesnt really matter now that I no longer staff, but maybe somebody will listen :3                                                                                              
 You hear a lot that school is a waste of time, that you don't really need it.  You see all the people on the internet who dropped out or didn't go at all and are doing fine.  The problem is you don't see the people who don't succeed.  The ones who drop out and end up homeless and think "Man I should have stayed in school," because those people aren't deemed as "interesting."  Just know that school is something most people should go through.  The grand majority of people need school to get an income and own a house, and only the select few that don't seem to be the only ones who people look up to.  Just keep that in mind.

replies.body:
What are you guys looking forward to? Nothing.
What do you guys hate most about school?  People and the education system.
What are your favorite or least favorite subjects? Social studies is cool.

By the way, almost everything I do is self-taught. Grammar, computer stuffs, and everything in between. The way I'm taught is really flawed and the teachers are confusing to lots of students, which also might be a flaw in how TEACHERS are taught/instructed. The only things I've picked up from school is reading, addition, counting, and the alphabet. I taught myself everything else including division/subtraction/multiplication.

replies.body:
What are you guys looking forward to? 

Since I'm in school ATM, there isn't much to look forward to (well IMO xD) except seeing my friends ^~^

What do you guys hate most about school?  

Naggy teachers, working, homework, waking up early, making sure you have everything organized, walking into 7 different classes knowing you have assignments to do, and finally, tests/quizzes/exams.

What are your favorite or least favorite subjects?

Favorite; lunch&my techno music class. hehe

Least Favorite; Social Studies/History, Science, Math, Language Arts and Choir.

replies.body:
What are you guys looking forward to? 
Friends and the end of School
What do you guys hate most about school?  
Learning in science. Having a head full of info leaves me speechless, and retarded. Ex: Stares at the wall thinking of nothing. Slept through most of it while in class, and my teacher had to actually wake me up in front of the class. (Great job Warbry!)
Also homework, I basically didn't do any of it last year so having a high expectation to do them is pressure me to...to...actually do it D: 
Hmm I also had a problem with sleeping since I mostly stayed up till 1 hour I wake up then end up sleeping though the pre-first period.
What are your favorite or least favorite subjects?
Math, I'm left in complete awe in the steps it takes to do a simple thing, so I mostly sleep through it all and when we have worksheets on it, I know jack all what to do. :D

I'm a total wreck :3

I'm a total wreck :3

replies.body:
What are you guys looking forward to? 
Seeing my friends at lunch and my classes!
What do you guys hate most about school?  
TIME CONSUMING. I HAVE THREE ADVANCED PLACEMENT SCIENCE CLASSES THIS YEAR. (goodbye social life and gaming ;-; )
What are your favorite or least favorite subjects?
Fave subjects: AP Calculus BC, AP Physics B and C
Least fave subjects: AP Language and Composition (teacher is hard on essays)
